physicalDescription.extent: The documents in the file are arranged in chronological order.
The foliation is circled in pencil, in the top right corner. It begins with the front cover of the file, on number 1, and runs through to 11, ending on the inside of the back cover of the file.

mods.abstract: The file contains a letter in Arabic from the Political Agent at Bahrain to the Sheikh of Bahrain, Salman bin Hamad Al-Khalifah, and some confidential correspondence with the British Residency at Bushire and the Financial Adviser to the Government in Bahrain, Charles Darlymple Belgrave, on the oil concession and the drilling activities in the additional off-shore area, including islands, reefs and shoals.
